game_description: A VR horror anthology for the ages! Created by artist and award winning VR developer: Justin "Tab" Rosete. The Haunted APK is a crazy ride you won't want to miss! It's an anthology of horror experiences, each with their own unique mechanics and visual styles. There will be no spoilers, so you'll have to play to find out more!
review_1: Played it, my favorite game is ski for thee, very silly and terrifying.
review_2: A nice rail shooter that converts my imagination from the gameboy/nes area into vr. I really dig the artwork and especially the chiptune soundtrack. This game proves, that pixelart is indeed possible in virtual reality.
review_4: Beautiful game we need more games like this wacky and weird
